text: Krystyna Zachwatowicz-Wajda (born Krystyna Zachwatowicz on 16 May 1930) is a Polish scenographer, costume designer and actress. She is a member of the Polish Film Academy. She is married to Academy Award-nominated director Andrzej Wajda. Zachwatowicz was born in Warsaw. Her parents were Jan Zachwatowicz and Maria Chod≈∫ko. She studied at Jagiellonian University in Krakow. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:Costume designers Category:Entertainers from Warsaw Category:Polish movie actors
title: Krystyna Zachwatowicz
